com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.dfu

Class DfuControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.dfu.DfuControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeCharacteristicListener, WriteDescriptorListener, WriteListener, DfuController

    public class DfuControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DfuController
    DfuController class is responsible for updating firmware for Beacon PRO devices.
